trans-unit.source: Represents a WS-Federation sign-out message.
This message is created when the received message has the action parameter (wa) set to "wsignout1.0".
A WS-Federation sign-out message is sent by a relying party (RP) to a security token service (STS) to sign out of the current session with that STS.
The wa parameter must be set to "wsignout1.0" and an optional wreply parameter may be set to indicate the URL to which the client should be redirected by the STS after sign-out completes.

A <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignOutRequestMessage> message is created by the static methods of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage> class, for example the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage.CreateFromUri%2A> method, when the wa parameter is set to "wsignout1.0".
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SignOutRequestMessage"></xref> class with the specified base URL.
The wa message parameter (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage.Action%2A> property) is initialized to "wsignout1.0".
The base URL to which this message applies.
baseUrl is `null`.
baseUrl is not a valid, absolute URI.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SignOutRequestMessage"></xref> class with the specified base URL and wreply parameter.
The wa message parameter (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage.Action%2A> property) is initialized to "wsignout1.0".
The base URL to which this message applies.
The value of the wreply parameter.
The URL to which the reply should be sent.
reply is either empty or `null`.
-or-
reply is not a valid, absolute URI.
baseUrl is `null`.
baseUrl is not a valid, absolute URI.
Gets or sets the wreply parameter of the message.
The wreply parameter specifies the URL to which the browser should be redirected after sign-out has been completed.
The wreply parameter is optional.
Set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignOutRequestMessage> property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wreply parameter from the message.
The value of the wreply parameter.
This is the URL to which the browser should be redirected.
An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.
Validates the current instance.
The wa parameter (the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage.Action"></xref> property) is not set to "wsignout1.0".
Writes the message in query string form to the specified text writer.
This method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignOutRequestMessage.Validate%2A> method before writing the message.
The writer to which to write the message.
writer is `null`.
